SourceProxy.label: PIO Reader
SourceProxy.name: PIOReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads PIO dump files into an unstructured or hypertree grid.

SourceProxy.Documentation: PIO is a file format in support of XRAGE. The input file (.pio) opened by the PIO reader is an ASCII description of the data files within a dump directory numbered by cycle. The reader uses a PIOData class to read the file and a PIOAdaptor to build an unstructured or hypertree grid from the data. Requested data is filled into the structures.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: ASCII .pio file describes locations of data files, type and order of data written to the files.

IntVectorProperty.name: HyperTreeGrid
IntVectorProperty.label: Use HyperTree Grid (HTG) for AMR Mesh

Documentation.short_help: Specify if hypertree grid is created rather than unstructured for AMR.
Documentation.long_help: Specify if hypertree grid is created rather than unstructure for AMR.

IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property determines if AMR in the PIO file is created as a hypertree grid rather than as an unstructured grid.

IntVectorProperty.name: Tracers
IntVectorProperty.label: Load Tracers

Documentation.short_help: Specify if tracer data is read.
Documentation.long_help: Specify if tracer points and data are read into a separate unstructured grid.

IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property determines if tracer data is read into a second unstructured grid.

IntVectorProperty.name: Float64
IntVectorProperty.label: Load variables as doubles (Float64)

Documentation.short_help: Specify if AMR and tracer data is read as 64 bit float rather than 32 bit.
Documentation.long_help: Specify if AMR and tracer data is read as 64 bit float rather than 32 bit.

IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property determines if the AMR and tracer variable data is read as 64 bit float.

StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Variables written to the data files are described in the .pio file and are presented for selection. Only selected variables are loaded for a time step.

StringVectorProperty.label: Time Array
StringVectorProperty.name: TimeArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property sets which field data to use as time arrays to read. If set to Default, time steps are incremented integer values starting at zero.
